name: Clash of Companies
description:
Get ready to be the next Wizard of Ohama or become the next Rothschild or J.P Morgan. This InfoXpression, Zenith, the E-Cell of GGSIPU presents ‚ÄùClash of Companies 3.0.

It's the game of risk, wits and your negotiation abilities. Be the part of a real-time simulation of Corporate World. Your sole aim throughout the event will be to extract maximum profit from the transactions, auctions, elections and dealings solely on the strength of your gut instincts and your negotiation powers.
The entire competition will be between two factions -

Business Houses(MNC) - The business houses shall sell their stakes to the banks, take loans and buy Industries in auctions which shall reap profits, keeping in mind loan repayments.

Investment Banks - The investment banks will provide loans, buy stakes and invest in Business houses. Their risks and backing will be boon or bane for the Business Houses.

In each faction, the one with maximum valuation in that faction shall be crowned as the Wizard of Investments.

Experience the thrill of being a part of the Business World on

To confirm your participation, pay Rs. 150 to following via Paytm.

Venue:D-Auditorium

description:

name: Codexpress
description:
Is your coding fast as an express, then this event is specifically for you

Codexpress is designed specifically for students of 1st and 2nd year and this event is all about your coding speed and time management.You will have to solve questions of different difficulty level in small duration of time,testing your skills and their proper execution.So Xpress your coding skills with Xpress speed.
You will have to solve 15 questions of increasing difficulty level in a span of 1 hour only.
The one who would solve maximum questions in minimum time would become the Xpress king.
It is advisiable to carry your own laptops

Prizes Worth : 8000 INR

NOTE - Only 1st and 2nd year are eligible for prizes.

name: Space Jam
description:
Greetings to one and all! RenderedSpace is organizing its debut gamejam at InfoXpression 2K19! This gamejam has a slight twist to it. You submit your games to us on https://itch.io/jam/spacejam-rs till 10th of October. Our panel would review your games and shortlist you for the final round at InfoX! In the event you'll get a chance to meet other game devs and also a chance to test your game in public! Yes, we have a code review round and a public review round where in people on campus would play your game and rate their experience! The winner would literally be the People's Champion! That's not all, we have a cash prize of $150 for the winner and lots of official Unity Swags for all the other finalists!

Online round: 1-10 October

On-campus round: 12 October

Venue: D-Block Auditorium, USICT Campus, Dwarka Sector 16C, New Delhi

For any queries, feel free to contact

name: Robo Liga
description:
Fusing technology with sports seems to be an inherent quality among us engineers. Hence this InfoXpression , we at Electrotech, USICT present you Robo Liga, the perfect place to be if you have a zeal for robotics and are a soccer lover.

This is an event where we aim to find the perfect soccer master in robots. Build a manually controlled robot capable of competing one on one in the game of soccer. Robots can be wired or wireless( Extra points for wireless! ).

name: Gizmo Clench
description:

INFOXPRESSION presents *Gizmo Clench*.

Gizmo Clench is the competition which includes the designing and analysis of the circuits. It is an event which will test a participants' knowledge on the basics of electronics. It includes the building and implementation of design from basic logic circuits to hardcore electronic circuits

*Preliminary round*: It has MCQ questions, limited time will be given.

*Final round*: It has some problem statements, the corresponding circuit has to be designed and implemented.
